name: Personality Insights Node.js Web Starter
description: A simple Node.js app that uses Personality Insights to analyze text to derive personality traits. This boilerplate will be DEPRECATED soon, please use the Deploy to Bluemix in: https://github.com/watson-developer-cloud/personality-insights-nodejs
